RcodeBlock

RcodeBlock.Rd

RcodeBlock

RcodeBlock

Super class

teal.reporter::ContentBlock -> RcodeBlock

Method new()

Returns a RcodeBlock object.

Usage

RcodeBlock$new(content = character(0), ...)

Arguments

content

(character(1) or character(0)) a string assigned to this RcodeBlock

...

any rmarkdown R chunk parameter and it value.

Details

Returns a RcodeBlock object with no content and no parameters.

Returns

RcodeBlock

Method set_params()

Sets the parameters of this RcodeBlock.

Usage

RcodeBlock$set_params(params)

Arguments

params

(list) any rmarkdown R chunk parameter and its value.

Details

The parameters has bearing on the rendering of this block.

Returns

invisibly self

Method get_params()

Returns the parameters of this RcodeBlock.

Usage

RcodeBlock$get_params()

Returns

character the parameters of this RcodeBlock

Method get_available_params()

Returns an array of parameters available to this RcodeBlock.

Usage

RcodeBlock$get_available_params()

Returns

a character array of parameters

Method from_list()

Create the RcodeBlock from a list.

Usage

RcodeBlock$from_list(x)

Arguments

x

named list with two fields c("text", "params"). Use the get_available_params method to get all possible parameters.

Returns

invisibly self

Method to_list()

Convert the RcodeBlock to a list.

Usage

RcodeBlock$to_list()

Returns

named list with a text and params.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

RcodeBlock$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.

On this page

teal.reporter is a part of the NEST and pharmaverse.
